Mountains by Oceans

Startup Conference


Friday April 17 and Saturday April 18, 2015

Mountains by Oceans is a startup conference for entrepreneurs to connect and be discovered. Anyone who has a concrete idea to share is encouraged to attend for free. There will also be sessions with speakers and panelists.
